Grammar:    DataElement 5.0
Namespace:  shr.test

EntryElement: ChoiceOfDatishThings
Value:        date or dateTime or StringishDateTime

EntryElement: ThingWithChoiceField
1..1          ChoiceOfDatishThings

EntryElement: PrimitiveTypeConstraintOnField
Based on:     ThingWithChoiceField
              ChoiceOfDatishThings value is type dateTime

EntryElement: NonPrimitiveTypeConstraintOnField
Based on:     ThingWithChoiceField
              ChoiceOfDatishThings value is type StringishDateTime

Element:      StringishDateTime
Value:        string
